option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: +experiment=scannetpp data_loader.train.batch_size=1 dataset.test_chunk_interval=1 trainer.val_check_interval=0.2 train.eval_model_every_n_val=3 dataset.roots=[datasets/scannetpp] mode=test dataset.near=1. dataset.far=200. test.compute_scores=true dataset.view_sampler.num_context_views=2 dataset.view_sampler.min_distance_between_context_views=5 dataset.view_sampler.max_distance_between_context_views=15 model.encoder.num_scales=2 model.encoder.upsample_factor=4 model.encoder.lowest_feature_resolution=8 model.encoder.monodepth_vit_type=vitb model.encoder.gaussian_regressor_channels=32 model.encoder.color_large_unet=true model.encoder.feature_upsampler_channels=128 model.encoder.multiview_trans_nearest_n_views=3 model.encoder.costvolume_nearest_n_views=3 checkpointing.pretrained_model=pretrained/depthsplat-gs-base-dl3dv-256x448-75cc0183.pth wandb.project=depthsplat wandb.mode=disabled test.save_gt_image=true test.save_depth_concat_img=true test.save_input_images=true test.save_image=true test.save_depth=true test.save_video=true test.stablize_camera=true output_dir=output/no_finetune
